menu.title: Hummus with Pita Bread
menu.description: Crafted from chickpeas, tahini, and a blend of spices, served with lightly toasted pita bread slices.

menu.title: Falafel
menu.description: Deep-fried chickpea or fava bean patties, often served with tahini sauce or in pita bread.

menu.title: Dolma
menu.description: Grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, pine nuts, and herbs.

menu.title: Brushetta
menu.description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with diced tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

menu.title: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

menu.title: Greek Salad
menu.description: Classic salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, red onions, and feta cheese, drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with oregano.

menu.title: Tabbouleh
menu.description: A refreshing salad made with finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, onion, and soaked bulgur, dressed with olive oil and lemon juice.

menu.title: Chickpea Salad
menu.description: A hearty salad with chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and feta cheese, tossed in olive oil and lemon dressing.

menu.title: Grilled Souvlaki
menu.description: Skewers of marinated and grilled lamb or chicken, served with pita bread and tzatziki.

menu.title: Ratatouille
menu.description: French Proven√ßal vegetable stew made with ingredients like eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, and flavored with herbs.

menu.title: Seafood Risotto
menu.description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with a variety of fresh seafood, herbs, and saffron.

menu.title: Grilled Swordfish
menu.description: Freshly grilled swordfish seasoned with olive oil, lemon, and herbs. Served with potatoes.
